current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Improper Payments Elimination and Recovery
		  Improvement Act of 2012, including making changes to the Do Not Pay initiative,
		  for improved detection, prevention, and recovery of improper payments to
		  deceased individuals, and for other purposes.

text.#text:
data analytics

				preventing, and recovering improper payments through pre-award, post-award
				pre-payment, and post-payment analysis, which shall include a description of
				any analysis or investigations incorporating—

review and data
				matching of payments and beneficiary enrollment lists of State programs carried
				out using Federal funds for the purposes of identifying eligibility
				duplication, residency ineligibility, duplicate payments, or other potential
				improper payment issues;

review of
				multiple Federal agencies and programs for which comparison of data could show
				payment duplication; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
determines are effective, which may
				include investigation or review of information from multiple Federal agencies
				or programs; and

text.#text:
the metrics used
				in determining whether the analytic and investigatory efforts have reduced, or
				contributed to the reduction of, improper payments or improper
				awards.
